channel.title: Creating a game with openears – Politepix

item.title: Creating a game with openears
item.dc:creator: justking141
item.description: So I just found out about this program and am trying to implement it into one of my games, but I think it’s listening for too long. I say jump and a few seconds later he jumps, after he’s already dead. Is there a way to have it react more quickly to the commands?

item.title: Reply To: Creating a game with openears
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Welcome,

Realtime, offline recognition is the requirement that the RapidEars plugin was created for: /rapidears
